headline: Pfizer: Danuglipron Could Tip The Scale In A Few Years, But For Now, Sell
summary: Medicare changes will cut $1 billion from 2025 revenue, with Pfizer now responsible for 20% of catastrophic drug costs. Read why PFE stock is a Sell.
